TGServerService.ServerInstance Class Reference

The class which holds all interface components. There are no safeguards for call race conditions so these must be guarded against internally More...

Detailed Description

The class which holds all interface components. There are no safeguards for call race conditions so these must be guarded against internally

329  lastError = null;
330  SendMessage("BYOND: Update completed!", MessageType.DeveloperInfo);
331  Service.WriteInfo(String.Format("BYOND update {0} completed!", GetVersion(ByondVersion.Installed)), EventID.BYONDUpdateComplete);
332  return true;
333  }
334  catch (Exception e)
335  {
336  lastError = e.ToString();
337  SendMessage("BYOND: Update failed!", MessageType.DeveloperInfo);
338  Service.WriteError("BYOND update failed! Error: " + e.ToString(), EventID.BYONDUpdateFail);
339  return false;
340  }
341  finally
342  {
343  lock(ByondLock) {
344  updateStat = ByondStatus.Idle;
345  }
346  }
347  }
348  }

196  if (compilerCurrentStatus != CompilerStatus.Uninitialized && compilerCurrentStatus != CompilerStatus.Initialized)
197  return "Compiler busy!";
198  if (!Monitor.TryEnter(watchdogLock))
199  return "Watchdog locked!";
200  try
201  {
202  if (currentStatus != DreamDaemonStatus.Offline)
203  return "Watchdog running!";
204  lock (configLock)
205  {
206  CleanGameFolder();
207  Program.DeleteDirectory(GameDir);
208  string error = null;
209  if (copy)
210  {
211  Program.CopyDirectory(Config.ServerDirectory, new_location);
212  Directory.CreateDirectory(new_location);
213  Environment.CurrentDirectory = new_location;
214  try
215  {
216  Program.DeleteDirectory(Config.ServerDirectory);
217  }
218  catch (Exception e)
219  {
220  error = "The move was successful, but the path " + Config.ServerDirectory + " was unable to be deleted fully!";
221  Service.WriteWarning(String.Format("Server move from {0} to {1} partial success: {2}", Config.ServerDirectory, new_location, e.ToString()), EventID.ServerMovePartial);
222  }
223  }
224  else
225  {
226  try
227  {
228  Environment.CurrentDirectory = di2.Root.FullName;
229  Directory.Move(Config.ServerDirectory, new_location);
230  Environment.CurrentDirectory = new_location;
231  }
232  catch
233  {
234  Environment.CurrentDirectory = Config.ServerDirectory;
235  throw;
236  }
237  }
238  Service.WriteInfo(String.Format("Server moved from {0} to {1}", Config.ServerDirectory, new_location), EventID.ServerMoveComplete);
239  Config.ServerDirectory = new_location;
240  return null;
241  }
242  }
243  finally
244  {
245  Monitor.Exit(watchdogLock);
246  }
247  }
248  finally
249  {
250  Monitor.Exit(CompilerLock);
251  }
252  }
253  finally
254  {
255  Monitor.Exit(ByondLock);
256  }
257  }
258  finally
259  {
260  Monitor.Exit(RepoLock);
261  }
262  }
263  catch (Exception e)
264  {
265  Service.WriteError(String.Format("Server move from {0} to {1} failed: {2}", Config.ServerDirectory, new_location, e.ToString()), EventID.ServerMoveFailed);
266  return e.ToString();
267  }
268  }

216  SendMessage(String.Format("BYOND: Updating to version {0}.{1}...", major, minor), MessageType.DeveloperInfo);
217 
218  //DOWNLOADING
219 
220  try
221  {
222  client.DownloadFile(String.Format(ByondRevisionsURL, major, minor), RevisionDownloadPath);
223  }
224  catch
225  {
226  SendMessage("BYOND: Update download failed. Does the specified version exist?", MessageType.DeveloperInfo);
227  lastError = String.Format("Download of BYOND version {0}.{1} failed! Does it exist?", major, minor);
228  Service.WriteWarning(String.Format("Failed to update BYOND to version {0}.{1}!", major, minor), EventID.BYONDUpdateFail);
229  lock (ByondLock)
230  {
231  updateStat = ByondStatus.Idle;
232  }
233  return;
234  }
235  }
236  lock (ByondLock)
237  {
238  updateStat = ByondStatus.Staging;
239  }
240 
241  //STAGING
242 
243  ZipFile.ExtractToDirectory(RevisionDownloadPath, StagingDirectory);
244  lock (ByondLock)
245  {
246  File.WriteAllText(StagingDirectoryInner + VersionFile, String.Format("{0}.{1}", major, minor));
247  //IMPORTANT: SET THE BYOND CONFIG TO NOT PROMPT FOR TRUSTED MODE REEE
248  Directory.CreateDirectory(ByondConfigDir);
249  File.WriteAllText(ByondDDConfig, ByondNoPromptTrustedMode);
250  }
251  File.Delete(RevisionDownloadPath);
252 
253  lock (ByondLock)
254  {
255  updateStat = ByondStatus.Staged;
256  }
257 
258  switch (DaemonStatus())
259  {
260  case DreamDaemonStatus.Offline:
261  if(ApplyStagedUpdate())
262  lastError = null;
263  else
264  lastError = "Failed to apply update!";
265  break;
266  default:
267  RequestRestart();
268  lastError = "Update staged. Awaiting server restart...";
269  SendMessage(String.Format("BYOND: Staging complete. Awaiting server restart...", major, minor), MessageType.DeveloperInfo);
270  Service.WriteInfo(String.Format("BYOND update {0}.{1} staged", major, minor), EventID.BYONDUpdateStaged);
271  break;
272  }
273  }
274  catch (ThreadAbortException)
275  {
276  return;
277  }
278  catch (Exception e)
279  {
280  Service.WriteError("Revision staging errror: " + e.ToString(), EventID.BYONDUpdateFail);
281  lock (ByondLock)
282  {
283  updateStat = ByondStatus.Idle;
284  lastError = e.ToString();
285  RevisionStaging = null;
286  }
287  }
288  }
